```{r setup}
library(baRb)
library(ggplot2)

spots <- barb_get_spots('2024-01-01',
                        '2024-01-01',
                        advertiser_name = 'ITV',
                        async = FALSE)

head(spots)

spots_summary <- barb_rollup_spots(spots, granularity = "hour")

head(spots_summary)

spots_summary |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = impacts)) +
  geom_col() +
  labs(title = "ITV Spots on 1st January 2024", subtitle = "Generated by ITV's baRb package") +
  theme_minimal()

```
